channel.title: Something to take into thought
channel.description:
Bleh im going to sleep. either way this quote/philosophy/whatever has some pretty deep meaning. take it to thought, i sure did. pretty neat.
How do we know that sleep isn't our truest being? and if so, then we are all dreaming. Forever sleeping until we awake in our dreams, and then, once again sleep back to reality. stuck in reality, or stuck in a dream, how many possibilities are gone unseen. open your mind, look outside, maybe were all just a chain untied. think about it, are we all really alive? Is this a realization or a figment of our imagination. sit back and rest a while, live the fantasy with me. - Scagz
For all of you that don't understand this sort of stuff. its implying the possibility of alter universes or such subject. Think about it, sleeping [b][i]could[/i][/b] be our true being.

@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

jme:

To me, it just sounds like a bad attempt at sounding deep.

If I remember, you said that this is the best way for new people to get farther in the community. Although I agree this was a lame attempt at sounding deep.

item.title: Something to take into thought
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

whole idea of the thing was that people have opinions, truth was, half of the point of this thread was to see how many people had the “dick moves” in them to actually flame this. The thread wasn’t completely wasted on that reason only though. I dig t3h st00f.

Anyways, people have their own opinions, i just find it funny that people take their own time and waste it on pointing out how stupid that is, when in reality anyone could say their opinion is stupid also. it all revolves, theres no stop.

Read full topic

item.title: Something to take into thought
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:5, topic:228015”][quote author=dbzmaster link=topic=299666.msg2406275#msg2406275 date=1219722541]
Quit trying to kiss ass to get to rep.
[/quote]
It was an opinion, which deserved no sort of remark like that. but i was expecting some sort of flame some at least one person. The only thing i have to say is that rep means nothing.

edit: im only interested in everyone else’s opinions. Just works against me that no one posts. =[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2008, 05:34:47 am[/size][hr][quote author=Kane. link=topic=299666.msg2406421#msg2406421 date=1219730300]
Uh, no.
When you’re asleep it’s like, a random dream, or something. But, when you’re awake, everything that takes place effects your life.

When you wake up the next day, the things that happened yesterday still happened.
When you go to sleep, you could have a completely different dream to last nights.
[/quote]
Btw, i said could happen. ;]
Never said it was fact :[] Hopefully you aren’t thinking I’m crazy.[/quote]I don’t think you are crazy, really made me think.

[quote=“Kane., post:3, topic:228015”]Uh, no.
When you’re asleep it’s like, a random dream, or something. But, when you’re awake, everything that takes place effects your life.

When you wake up the next day, the things that happened yesterday still happened.
When you go to sleep, you could have a completely different dream to last nights.[/quote]sometimes you realize you’re dreaming, and are able to alter things, other than that. What we dream of is everything that happenes that day, or are memories.

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:4, topic:228015”][quote author=Kane. link=topic=299666.msg2406421#msg2406421 date=1219730300]
Uh, no.
When you’re asleep it’s like, a random dream, or something. But, when you’re awake, everything that takes place effects your life.

When you wake up the next day, the things that happened yesterday still happened.
When you go to sleep, you could have a completely different dream to last nights.
[/quote]Example:

Think: Nachos till you go to sleep

odds are you will dream something with nachos

Not exactly.
Dreams aren’t all that random. They come from SOME thought.[/quote]

Read full topic
